text: The Samsung Galaxy Note 5 is an Android phablet made and developed by Samsung. It was announced on August 13, 2015. It was released on August 21, 2015. == Features == Galaxy Note 5 has 5MP selfie camera, 16MP back camera, 5.7 inch Super AMOLED screen, 4GB RAM, 3000mAh battery capacity. 15W wired charger and 32GB, 64GB and 128GB storage options. == Software == Galaxy Note 5 run Android 5.1.1 Lollipop in first release, they can upgrade to other versions like Android 6.0 Marshmallow and Android 7.0 Nougat when came out. == Problems == BBC reported about Galaxy Note 5 has a pen problem such as wrongly removed it can damage the pen, this phone or both and inserting pen wrongly can cause the pen stop working forever. == Reviews == The Verge review the Samsung Galaxy Note 5 it is best Android phone with bigger screen and stylus. CNET review the Samsung Galaxy Note 5 it has good reviews such as taking very good outside picture, very good battery life and using pen has not felt better. It has bad reviews such as battery cannot remove and no external storage option. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Samsung Galaxy Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2015
title: Samsung Galaxy Note 5
